PROCEDURE barcodecheck *------------------------------------------------------------------------------ * Project.........: Exchange_server.pjx * Library.........: Exchange_server.vcx * Class.Module....: Exchange_server.BarcodeCheck * Called by.......: <NA> * Parameters......: <tcBarcode> * Returns.........: <none> * Notes...........: <public/nouser/default> Ïðîâåðêà øòðèõ-êîäà *------------------------------------------------------------------------------ LPARAMETERS tcBarcode
*17.01.2005 18:58 ->Îáúÿâëåíèå è èíèöèàëèçàöèÿ ïåðåìåííûõ LOCAL lcBarcode, ; lcSymbolCounter *** lcBarcode = ALLTRIM(tcBarcode) *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
WITH This
*17.01.2005 18:57 ->Ïðîâåðÿåì øòðèõ-êîä íà ñîäåðæàíèå ñèìâîëîâ íå ÿâëÿþùèõñÿ öèôðàìè FOR lcSymbolCounter = 1 TO LEN(lcBarcode) IF !ISDIGIT(SUBSTR(lcBarcode,lcSymbolCounter,1)) RETURN pcvBAR_ERR_UNDIG ENDIF ENDFOR *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*17.01.2005 19:02 ->Ïðîâåðèì øòðèõ-êîä DO CASE
CASE LEN(lcBarcode)=13 && EAN13 || UPC(A) with leading zero
*17.01.2005 19:13 ->Ïðîâåðÿåì êîíòðîëüíóþ öèôðó IF SUBSTR(lcBarcode,13,1) # .BarcodeCheckSumGenerate(SUBSTR(lcBarcode,1,12))
*18.01.2005 12:25 ->Âåðíåì îøèáêó RETURN pcvBAR_ERR_CHKSUM *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ENDIF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CASE LEN(lcBarcode)=12 && UPC(A) without leading zero
*17.01.2005 19:13 ->Ïðîâåðÿåì êîíòðîëüíóþ öèôðó IF SUBSTR(lcBarcode,12,1) # .BarcodeCheckSumGenerate(SUBSTR(lcBarcode,1,11))
*18.01.2005 12:25 ->Âåðíåì îøèáêó RETURN pcvBAR_ERR_CHKSUM *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ENDIF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CASE LEN(lcBarcode)=8 && EAN8 || UPC(E) with leading zero
*17.01.2005 19:13 ->Ïðîâåðÿåì êîíòðîëüíóþ öèôðó IF SUBSTR(lcBarcode,8,1) # .BarcodeCheckSumGenerate(SUBSTR(lcBarcode,1,7))
*18.01.2005 12:25 ->Âåðíåì îøèáêó RETURN pcvBAR_ERR_CHKSUM *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ENDIF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CASE LEN(lcBarcode)=7 && Ïðåôèêñ âåñîâîãî ØÊ || UPC(E) without leading zero
*18.01.2005 12:21 ->Îáúÿâëåíèå è èíèöèàëèçàöèÿ ïåðåìåííûõ LOCAL lcBarcodePrefix *** lcBarcodePrefix = SUBSTR(lcBarcode,1,2) *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*17.01.2005 19:13 ->Îïðåäåëèì îòíîñèòñÿ ØÊ ê âåñîâûì èëè íåò SELECT ; WeightBarcodePrefix.WeightBarcodePrefixID ; FROM WeightBarcodePrefix ; WHERE WeightBarcodePrefix.WeightBarcodePrefix == lcBarcodePrefix ; INTO CURSOR curWeightBarcodePrefix *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*18.01.2005 12:22 ->Åñëè ØÊ âåñîâîé IF _tally = 1
*18.01.2005 12:23 ->Äîáàâèì 0 è ñãåíåðèðóåì êîíòðîëüíóþ öèôðó lcBarcode = lcBarcode + [00000] lcBarcode = lcBarcode + .BarcodeCheckSumGenerate(lcBarcode) *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*18.01.2005 12:24 ->Âåðíåì èçìåíåííûé ØÊ RETURN lcBarcode *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ELSE
*17.01.2005 19:13 ->Ïðîâåðÿåì êîíòðîëüíóþ öèôðó IF SUBSTR(lcBarcode,7,1) # .BarcodeCheckSumGenerate(SUBSTR(lcBarcode,1,6))
*18.01.2005 12:25 ->Âåðíåì îøèáêó RETURN pcvBAR_ERR_CHKSUM *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ENDIF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ENDIF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
OTHERWISE
*18.01.2005 12:30 ->Âåðíåì îøèáêó RETURN pcvBAR_ERR_U_TYPE *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ENDCASE *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ENDWITH ******************************************************************************* ********************************* END METHOD ********************************** ******************************************************************************* ENDPROC PROCEDURE barcodechecksumgenerate *------------------------------------------------------------------------------ * Project.........: Exchange_server.pjx * Library.........: Exchange_server.vcx * Class.Module....: Exchange_server.BarcodeCheckSumGenerate * Called by.......: <.BarcodeCheck()> * Parameters......: <tcBarcode> * Returns.........: <none> * Notes...........: <public/nouser/default> Ãåíåðàöèÿ êîíòðîëüíîãî ñèìâîëà äëÿ øòðèõ-êîäà *------------------------------------------------------------------------------ LPARAMETERS tcBarcode
*17.01.2005 19:43 ->Îáúÿâëåíèå è èíèöèàëèçàöèÿ ïåðåìåííûõ LOCAL lcBarcode, ; lnBarcodeLen, ; lcBarcodeInverted, ; lnSumOdd, ; lnSumEven, ; lnSumOddAndEven, ; lnCheckSum, ; lnSymbolCounter *** lcBarcode = ALLTRIM(tcBarcode) lnBarcodeLen = LEN(lcBarcode) *** lcBarcodeInverted = [] lnSumOdd = 0 lnSumEven = 0 *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*17.01.2005 19:57 ->Ïåðåâîðà÷èâàåì ØÊ FOR lnSymbolCounter = 1 TO lnBarcodeLen lcBarcodeInverted = SUBSTR(lcBarcode,lnSymbolCounter,1) + lcBarcodeInverted ENDFOR *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*17.01.2005 19:31 ->Ñóììèðóåì íå÷¸òíûå (ODD) ïîçèöèè FOR lcSymbolCounter = 1 TO lnBarcodeLen STEP 2 lnSumOdd = lnSumOdd + VAL(SUBSTR(lcBarcodeInverted,lcSymbolCounter,1)) ENDFOR lnSumOdd = lnSumOdd * 3 *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*17.01.2005 19:32 ->Ñóììèðóåì ÷¸òíûå (EVEN) ïîçèöèè FOR lcSymbolCounter = 2 TO lnBarcodeLen STEP 2 lnSumEven = lnSumEven + VAL(SUBSTR(lcBarcodeInverted,lcSymbolCounter,1)) ENDFOR *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*17.01.2005 20:06 ->Ñóììèðóåì ðåçóëüòàòû lnSumOddAndEven = lnSumOdd + lnSumEven *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*17.01.2005 20:07 ->Âû÷èñëÿåì êîíòðîëüíóþ ñóììó lnCheckSum = 10-lnSumOddAndEven%10 *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*17.01.2005 20:08 ->Âîçâðàùàåì êîíòðîëüíûé ñèìâîë RETURN RIGHT(ALLTRIM(STR(lnCheckSum)),1) *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
******************************************************************************* ********************************* END METHOD ********************************** *******************************************************************************

ENDIF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ENDIF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*19.01.2005 14:54 ->Ïîëó÷èì èíôîðìàöèþ î ôàéëå ADIR(aFiles,.cMMSDir+[FILES/GMOFFMNT.DAT]) *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*19.01.2005 14:53 ->Åñëè ôàéë íå ïóñòîé IF aFiles[1,2] > 0
*19.01.2005 14:50 ->Íàðàùèâàåì ñ÷¸ò÷èê íå ïåðåäàííûõ äàííûõ lnFilesCount = lnFilesCount + 1 *------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ENDIF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ENDIF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*19.01.2005 15:03 ->Âåðíåì êîä îøèáêè RETURN pcvBAR_ERR_APPLY *------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WITH This

*18.02.2005 17:50 ->Ïðîâåðÿåì íåîáõîäèìîñòü âûâîäà ñîîáùåíèÿ íà ýêðàí IF BITAND(tnMessageType,.nMsgShow) > 0

*18.02.2005 18:05 ->Åñëè LOG-ôàéë îòêðûò - çàêðûâàåì IF .nLogHandle > 0 FCLOSE(.nLogHandle) ENDIF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*18.02.2005 18:06 ->Ñîçäàåì íîâûé LOG-ôàéë .dLogDate = DATE() *** lcLogFileName = .cLogDir+ ; [LOG]+ ; ALLTRIM(STR(YEAR(.dLogDate)))+ ; PADL(ALLTRIM(STR(MONTH(.dLogDate))),2,[0])+ ; PADL(ALLTRIM(STR(DAY(.dLogDate))),2,[0]) *** IF !FILE(lcLogFileName) .nLogHandle = FCREATE(lcLogFileName) ELSE .nLogHandle = FOPEN(lcLogFileName,12) FSEEK(.nLogHandle,2) ENDIF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ENDIF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*18.02.2005 18:11 ->Çàïèñûâàåì â LOG-ôàéë FPUTS(.nLogHandle,RIGHT(TTOC(DATETIME()),8)+[ | ]+ALLTRIM(tcMessage)) FFLUSH(.nLogHandle) *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ENDIF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ENDWITH ******************************************************************************* ********************************* END METHOD ********************************** ******************************************************************************* ENDPROC

*12.09.2005 13:37 ->Îáúÿâëåíèå è èíèöèàëèçàöèÿ ïåðåìåííûõ LOCAL lcBasisDBDir, ; lcOldAlias, ; lnStorageCount *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*12.09.2005 13:37 -> lcBasisDBDir = This.cntBasisDBDir.LocationGet() ***
*12.09.2005 15:18 ->Ñîçäàäèòü ñðèñîê ìïàãàçèíîâ IF !EMPTY(lcBasisDBDir) AND DIRECTORY(lcBasisDBDir)
*12.09.2005 15:18 ->Âûáèðàåì ñïèñîê ìàãàçèíîâ SELECT ; Storage.StorageID, ; Storage.StorageNo, ; OrgUnit.OUNM AS StorageNM; FROM (lcBasisDBDir+[Storage]) Storage ; INNER JOIN Basis!OrgUnit ON OrgUnit.OUID = Storage.StorageID ; INTO TABLE tmp\tmpStorageInfo *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*12.09.2005 15:18 -> IF _Tally > 0
lcOldAlias = ALIAS()
This.cmbStorage.DisplayValue = [] lnStorageCount = 1 SELECT tmpStorageInfo SCAN ALL IF lnStorageCount = 1 This.aStorageList[1,2] = tmpStorageInfo.StorageID This.aStorageList[1,1] = tmpStorageInfo.StorageNM ELSE DIMENSION This.aStorageList[lnStorageCount,2] This.aStorageList[lnStorageCount,2] = tmpStorageInfo.StorageID This.aStorageList[lnStorageCount,1] = tmpStorageInfo.StorageNM ENDIF
IF .nStorageID = tmpStorageInfo.StorageID This.cmbStorage.DisplayValue = tmpStorageInfo.StorageNM ENDIF
lnStorageCount = lnStorageCount + 1 ENDSCAN
This.cmbStorage.NumberOfElements = _Tally
*12.09.2005 15:01 ->Âîññòàíîâèì òåêóùèé Alias IF !EMPTY(lcOldAlias) AND USED(lcOldAlias) AND lcOldAlias#ALIAS() SELECT(lcOldAlias) ENDIF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ELSE ThisForm.cmbStorage.Enabled = .F. ENDIF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*12.09.2005 15:02 ->Óäàëèì âðåìåííóþ òàáëèöó USE IN IIF(USED([tmpStorageInfo]),[tmpStorageInfo],0) IF FILE([tmp\tmpStorageInfo.dbf]) ERASE tmp\tmpStorageInfo.dbf ENDIF ***
ENDIF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
******************************************************************************* ********************************* END METHOD ********************************** ******************************************************************************* ENDPROC
